statements: UPDATE students SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith', email='alice.smith@example.com' WHERE student_id=1

UPDATE students SET date_of_birth = '1995-08-25', student_class = 'Mathematics' WHERE first_name = 'Alice' AND last_name = 'Smith';
